artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Anthony Ballatore; Mill: Griswold Textile Print, Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Exclusive handprint. Dense floral print. Vert. Rpt. 36". Ambers & grey. Amber/Brazil Nut
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Anthony Ballatore%2C Larsen Design Studio
medium: Rayon, cotton, mohair; hand screenprint; dyed
text: Gardens are more than just flower beds. Here we are reminded that varying landscapes can be enhanced by thoughtful plantings. At LongHouse Larsen has done considerable earthmoving in order to create open spaces as well as secluded areas. Textiles with botanical references are also used to enhance the illusion of space in an interior.
title: Campo Lindo
